title: Are You Voting?
itunes:title: Are You Voting?
description:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners agree with rapper Blue Face who claimed that he was not voting in this years election. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a father and daughter couple, yes you read that correct! You won't believe why they are getting the hee haw. Also, Angela Yee is stil on vacation so Charlamagne and DJ Envy took her place with "Ask C and E"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
